config:
RR prefix-set RR 10.200.201.1, 10.200.202.1, 10.200.203.1, 10.200.204.1 end-set
LB-I prefix-set LB-I 10.200.0.0/15 eq 32 end-set
LB-O prefix-set LB-O 10.100.0.0/15 eq 32 end-set
RR route-policy RR if destination in RR then pass endif end-policy
ALL route-policy ALL done end-policy
LB-I route-policy LB-I if destination in LB-I then pass endif end-policy
LB-O route-policy LB-O if destination in LB-O then pass endif end-policy
RR-O route-policy RR-O if destination in LB-O then drop endif pass end-policy
RR_TEST route-policy RR_TEST if tag eq 18 then pass endif end-policy
</config
